title: First Post
content:
My pen is always leaking now! This blog, a classic example of a procrastination project. Started with the assumption it would only take a day or two, ended up taking a week and a half.

I'd never 'vibe coded' before and curious to see how valid the looming threat of AI is, decided to give it a shot. I started in chatGPT then moved to Copilot, then Cursor.

I knew the aesthetic I wanted in a website, mainly an interface for myself that appeared the pretentious artist/techie, and one that I could consequently post to socials on without ever opening a social media platform. Steele by a dream of shitposting from a pen and paper I embarked.

You're absolutely right!

Very quickly I was able to assemble a preview html and iterate on the aesthetic. The only programming language I know is lua and I don't have any experience in web development, yet I was interested to see if AI was the magic bullet that would allow laypersons to do any task.

After the html preview I used that to start requesting features be added and the real fun began.
